trends: There have been 116 other sightings in Dallas
There were no other sightings in Dallas on or around February 26th 2008
divs: sighting detailsi swear this to be fact. on the morning of febuary 26th, i was somehow encouraged to get up from my desk in my home office and go outside ang simply look up. i did so and there the craft was. as i viewed the craft, i could see and feel the energy being exhausted from the craft, like waves through my body. a tremendose wind preceeded the event. the craft was completely silent. a large triangle with all smooth, rounded edges. it was non-descript in color, grey\black. the craft travelled slow and steady with no woble at maybe 15-20mph heading sw. it travelled forward as one of the points of the triangle was clearly the lead or front of the craft. near the center of each of the 3 points of the triangle was a large dome with an amber glow that when viewed at close distance affected vision much like heat affecting air in a desert or on a highway. the domes were approximatly 30' in diameter and constant in color and light intensity. the overall size of the craft was around 150' along any one of the three sides. the hight or thickness of the craft is hard to say, yet i would approximate it to be 30-40'. at the very center of the craft was another dome the emmited no light, but rather anchored a complex array of ariels and antennas with apparaticies on the ends of some. the largest antenna was in the very center and came down maybe 20' or more from the bottom and was host to a slow pulsing red strobe, the only other light or color visable to me. for the first 30 seconds i didnt blink or move,... i knew what i was allowed to see. then reason struck, take a photo!!! not wanting to miss a single second of the event i franticly ran in my office to get the cammra the is allways by the photoprinter, it was not there. my wife had used it in the kitchen that day. in a frenzy i grabbed binoculars from the bookshelf and ran outside. it was winter, and with no leaves on the trees, i watched at 17x magnification the remaining minute or so of the event. the craft sailed sw toward downtown. i live in the flight-path of two very active airports, dallas luv, dfw airport and a smaller field in addison. this was no airplane. as a matter of fact, there were no airplanes in the sky, not one. this leads me to believe that the faa grounded, halted or rerouted airtraffic. needless to say, i'm a beleiver now. this event has profoundly changed the way i view the world and its place in the cosmos, not negatively though.it sounds fantastic if now crazy, but i believe that i was allowed to view the alien spacecraft.
Summary: Large silen triangle craft flew directly over my house at about 300 ft.
